timeline.body: Same comment as in the other PR, might be worth checking if the plain english description is `standard imagery basemap`, as opposed to the technical enum name?

replies.bodyText: I'm just thinking on most of them I think it just says "with a basemap style". Maybe that is easier. Any thoughts @Rachael-E ?
replies.author: jenmerritt

timeline.body:
Just noticing most of the other comments for this line in other samples now say `create a map with..`

Might be nice to make it uniform?

So as you have in the next file:
```suggestion
      // create a map with the topographic basemap style
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Just noticing most of the other comments for this line in other samples now say create a map with..

Might be nice to make it uniform?

So as you have in the next file:

Suggested change
// create an ArcGISMap with the topographic basemap
// create a map with the topographic basemap style
timeline.author: JonLavi

replies.bodyText: Thanks yes that was the plan to make it consistent, so will tidy this one!
replies.author: jenmerritt
